question: Assalaamu Alaykum Respected Mufti Saheb, I have a Question regarding reciting Tasbeeh-e-Fatima.
answer:
QUESTION
Should I recite tasbeeh rite after fard salah or is it allowed to wait till I finish my fard then sunnah salah and make tasbeeh? Jazakallah Khair. may Allah reward you for your good work.
ANSWER


Share:
It is preferable to recite Tasbeeh-e-Faatima immediately after the Fardh
Salaat. It may also be recited after performing the Sunnah Salaats.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
